column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Disappointed. Everyone was ordering around us
column2: and getting their food before us. Waiter never checked on us. We finally asked for our waiter. He never showed to redeem himself
column4: who took great care of us. They also made an excuse for him that he had a lot of tables. Maybe he should find a slower paced profession. After being so hungry
column5: you would've thought the food would've tasted even better. It was okay. Nothing to brag about
column6: but it was hot cause we had skillets. The pancakes
column8: nothing to brag about. I would never not leave a tip
column9: but I would like to think they deserved it
column10: cause it's not an easy profession.
